alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 13 at 8:24PM CDT until June 13 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... South central Wheeler County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Collingsworth County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 6 miles northwest of Dozier, or 10 miles southwest of Shamrock, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Dozier, Lutie, Lela and Samnorwood. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
